effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

spells.description:

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Noggenfogger Ultimate Deluxe

spells.description: Use: Summons a Blackwater Pirate to aid you in combat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: With an elixir as unpredictable as Noggenfogger's, you never know if to expect pirates or confusion.

spells.description: Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 500,997 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 120,294 Shadow damage.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
